      • addToDish

        public void addToDish(Dish dish)
        Adds an signle dish to this ingredient dishlist. Means a dish require this dish.
        Parameters:
        dish- - The dish to add in the ingredient (or reverse =))

      • removeDish

        public void removeDish(Dish dish)
        Remove a single dish from this ingredient dishlist. Means a dish does not anymore require this ingredient.
        Parameters:
        dish - -The dish to remove in the ingredient (or reverse =))
